name: Therapig: Day One
description:
A game by Invisible Studios:

  • Dani Gómez as Pixel Artist / Sound designer
  • Montse M. Sillero as Concept / Pixel Artist
  • Daniel Ureña as Game Designer / Narrative
  • Sergio Martínez as Programmer
Music
  • Ethereal by Ghostrifter Official
  • I’m falling by Rexlambo
Therapig - Day one is a game created for 1st Annual May Day Mental Health Game Jam.

Full game is under development.

Thanks for playing!
